channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Heroes & Survivors
channel.desc: In a year of extreme weather, raging fires, deadly mudslides, and horrific hurricanes, communities rally together to save themselves from disaster.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Heroes & Survivors
channel.desc: Everest guides rescue climbers from the death zone; a quiet country town battles a fearsome flash flood; a hero drives survivors to salvation during a hurricane; a frigid ocean sinks a fishing boat and the crew fights for survival.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Heroes & Survivors
channel.desc: An adventure turns terrifying when a hiker gets stuck in quicksand; backcountry skiers fight for survival in a brutal blizzard; a surfer gets lost at sea; innocent animals fight for survival in hurricane aftermath.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: World's Deadliest Weather
channel.desc: The Bahamas get pounded by 200mph winds during category five Hurricane Dorian - the most intense cyclone the country has ever seen; in Arizona, flash flooding sweeps a couple away resulting in a heart-stopping rescue.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: World's Deadliest Weather
channel.desc: A violent tornado outbreak unleashes carnage on Oklahoma, Texas and Louisiana; A Swedish snow mobile rider gets lost in the mountains during a night-time adventure; A recordbreaking super typhoon brings down the roof on a wedding in the Philippines.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Top Ten
channel.desc: Fueled by warm ocean water, they are the most violent and destructive storms on earth; counting down the worst Hurricanes to hit the planet since the start of the new millennium.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Hurricanes: Inside the Eye
channel.desc: Illustrating what storm surge is and why it's often the scariest ingredient of a hurricane; hear harrowing accounts of those that lived through some of the most deadly hurricanes in history.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Top Ten Worst Hurricanes
channel.desc: Counting down the deadliest, most damaging storms to ever make landfall in the US; from Maine to Texas.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: America's Weekend Headquarters
channel.desc: The science and stories of weather, plus in-depth forecasts with a focus on weekend weather.

channel.name: Weather Channel US

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: America's Weekend Headquarters
channel.desc: The science and stories of weather, plus in-depth forecasts with a focus on weekend weather.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Weekend Recharge
channel.desc: Though it has "weekend" in the title, this show discusses the week ahead in addition to offering suggestions for what to do on Saturday and Sunday. Weather Channel meteorologists go beyond the elements outside and into the realm of lifestyle tips. Each host has a recurring segment on "Weekend Recharge," which include helping parents get a fresh start to each day and explaining how the weather is expected to impact the weekend's scheduled sports action.

channel.title: Pattrn

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Hurricane 360
channel.desc: The largest Atlantic hurricane on record makes landfall on the New Jersey Coast.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Hurricane 360
channel.desc: A hurricane barrels across the Gulf of Mexico triggering the largest U.S. evacuation in history.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Hurricane 360
channel.desc: In the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina, the city of New Orleans slips into anarchy as the residents struggle for survival.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Hurricane 360
channel.desc: Hurricane Irene carves a path of destruction along the East Coast; rivers reach hundred-year-flood levels or higher, washing whole towns and villages off the map.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Hurricane 360
channel.desc: Super Storm Sandy sets new records along the East Coast, including the largest waves ever recorded in New York Harbor.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Hurricane 360
channel.desc: Just weeks after Katrina batters the Gulf Coast, Hurricane Rita slams into Louisiana and Texas, causing the worst traffic jam in U.S. history.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Hurricane 360
channel.desc: Hurricane Katrina turned 49 Mississippi counties into disaster zones.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Hurricane 360
channel.desc: Rising seawater comes in contact with electrical wires at a residence, setting off a six-alarm fire that engulfs nearly 130 houses; the second biggest fire in New York City history.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deadline to Disaster
channel.desc: Category 5 Dorian becomes the strongest hurricane to hit the Bahamas; as storm surge pours into his home, a family wades through chest-deep water in a quest to find higher ground; locals on jet skis rescue neighbors from flooded homes.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deadline to Disaster
channel.desc: August 2005, Hurricane Katrina's massive 27 foot storm surge batters the Mississippi coastline obliterating beachfront property; in Waveland, a father and son forced to flee their home by boat, find themselves rescuing neighbors from the storm surge.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deadline to Disaster
channel.desc: As Hurricane Michael fury peaks, deadly flying projectiles force a storm tracker and his team to ride out the eyewall in their car; Panama City News Herald employees hunker down at a building housing their printing press.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deadline to Disaster
channel.desc: On Aug. 10, 2020, hurricane-force winds blast through Iowa battering the city of Cedar Rapids; this rare Derecho packing powerful straight line winds takes the city by surprise and leaves behind a trail of destruction.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deadline to Disaster
channel.desc: Hurricane Sally makes landfall along Alabama's Gulf Coast, the first tropical cyclone to do so since 2004; intensifying to a Category 2 storm and turning east just prior to landfall, Sally catches many residents along the panhandle by surprise.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deadline to Disaster
channel.desc: On Aug. 4, 2020, Hurricane Isaias slams into the North Carolina coast before tracking northward, spawning 37 tornadoes in eight states and causing catastrophic flooding in Pennsylvania.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deadline to Disaster
channel.desc: Category 4 Hurricane Laura batters Cameron, La.; its wicked winds and torrential rains reach inland to Lake Charles, La.; residents take cover as their windows break, the power goes out and storm surge takes over.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deadline to Disaster
channel.desc: Hurricane Ida strikes the Louisiana coast 16 years after Hurricane Katrina, following a destructive path from the low-lying parishes to the cities of the Northeastern United States.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Pattrn

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Rocky Mountain Wreckers
channel.desc: After a tractor pulling double trailers rolls over during a freak snowstorm, Mountain Recovery faces massive damage and an impossible deadline; heavy winds assault I-80 in Wyoming, closing the highway and pushing Jim and Brendan to their limits.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Rocky Mountain Wreckers
channel.desc: When freezing fog ices over I-80, Brendan gets his first test on a rollover recovery; heavy snow causes chaos for Big Jon and Kory as they battle a difficult jackknife; a moving van blasts off the highway in a snowstorm, pushing the Stauffer's team to perform a long pull up a steep incline.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Rocky Mountain Wreckers
channel.desc: Charlie rescues a family trapped in a live lane of traffic; the Stauffer's Utah crew battles to upright a rollover pinned between moving traffic and open water; a sinkhole swallows a 200,000-pound excavator.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Rocky Mountain Wreckers
channel.desc: Two separate crashes in Utah spur the Stauffer's crew to perform a pair of dramatic recoveries; Bad Grandpa goes for a plunge when the Mountain Recovery team attempts a daring job on a raging river.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Rocky Mountain Wreckers
channel.desc: Intense winds and icy roads send a semi to the edge of a sheer drop; heavy snowfall forces Charlie out of his comfort zone and into a much bigger truck than normal; Bad Grandpa schools the boss in the art of recovery.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Rocky Mountain Wreckers
channel.desc: Charlie struggles with a surprise storm on Vail Pass; Brendan faces pressure after a promotion; Cory's rigging and patience are tested by a heavy manure load.
